featuredPost.title: F1's $22.7 Billion Grid: How Team Valuations Have Transformed Under Liberty Media
featuredPost.excerpt: An exhaustive analysis of how Formula 1 team valuations have exploded since Liberty Media's 2017 acquisition. We break down Ferrari's $6.5B valuation, McLaren's remarkable rise, and why even backmarker teams are now worth nine figures.

posts.title: Andretti-Cadillac F1 Entry: The $600M Investment Reshaping Formula 1

posts.title: NASCAR Charter Economics: Why They're Now Worth $40M+ Each
posts.excerpt: The NASCAR charter system transformed team ownership from a gamble into a bankable asset. Here's how they work and why values have exploded.
